name: Tupuch
description:
Tupuch - 3D puzzle game designed for this jam! Your task is to find a way out of the rooms, sometimes it's quite difficult, but don't worry, it's interesting with nice music in the background. There are only three levels in the game at the moment, but if you like the game, then from the game for jam, I will already make a full-fledged game with different tasks for you.

DEV NOTE

The game went through a lot of edits, but that didn't stop you from playing it. The game was developed for 3 days!
